brief: Controls the routing of sounds on multi-channel devices

methods.name: activeChannel()
methods.desc:
Controls which output channel sounds will be played back to.

 After selecting a new output channel, all sounds that start `play()`ing 
 will be sent to that channel.

methods.name: availableChannels()
methods.desc: Gets the number of output channels available on an output device

methods.name: usePortAudio()
methods.desc: Force using PortAudio instead of JavaSound.

description: Controls the routing of sounds on multi-channel devices
name: MultiChannel
